articles.title: DGA Awards Movie Nominees: Anderson, Coogler, Del Toro, Safdie And Zhao - Deadline
articles.description: The Directors Guild of America revealed its feature film nominees Thursday for the 78th DGA Awards, honoring 2025's most outstanding helmers.

articles.title: Greenlanders express fear and indignation as Trump eyes territory - BBC
